plot: Leo, after a traffic accident, è rushed to the clinic and tell Professor Bennett, his attending physician, the history and deeds of Milarepa, Tibetan monk with whom you identify. è legend told in three distinct chapters: black magic, or the practices of witches; the white magic, or the achievement of perfection and wisdom and the Transfiguration, which is the detachment from every à really material through the resurrection. Film hard but impactful Mystic, for the ' time.
